full_summary:
# TIC3 Air Tactical Data Link (TDL) Fixed Central Ground Entry Station (GES)
==============================================

## Tender Information
----------------------

### Reference and Solicitation Details
----------------------------------------
*   **Reference Number (Numéro de référence): [PW-__QD-028-29082](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/06/05/8152ae3d0ae0a4f8ac659956dd9f5710/ABES.PROD.PW__QD.B028.E29082.EBSU003.PDF)**
*   **Solicitation Number (Numéro de sollicitation): [W8475-235518/A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/06/05/8152ae3d0ae0a4f8ac659956dd9f5710/ABES.PROD.PW__QD.B028.E29082.EBSU003.PDF)**
*   **Publication Date (Date de publication): June 6, 2023**
*   **Tender Closing Date (Date limite de remise des offres): August 14, 2023, at 14:00**

## Contract Requirements
-------------------------

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement of systems and subsystems for Fixed Central, Parent, and Child TDL GEP, including five years in-service support with options for up to two additional years, as described in Annex A and Annex B. This contract aims to modernize the current Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) voice, data, and video communication infrastructure and provide additional data link communication infrastructure to enable effective battlespace management and increase situational awareness.

The systems and subsystems will support a variety of activities across a spectrum of conflict, including humanitarian assistance, disaster relief, peacekeeping, and domestic, joint/combined, and expeditionary missions.

## Trade Agreements and Procurement Strategy
-------------------------------------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP). The Best Overall Proposal procurement strategy will be used.

## Contact Information
----------------------
